pageContent: Background: In men with PCa, large variations of PROs after RP or high-dose RAD might be related to between-country differences of medical and sociodemographic variables, and differences in PROs before treatment in the sexual and urinary domains.

metaData.source:
Sexual dysfunction following treatment for prostate cancer: nursing assessment and interventions
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8278282/
